message: I'm being fair, but I'm also trying to get the best deal for myself.  Let's get this done in the first round!
Let's meet in the middle, we both get a good amount
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more than what you offered.  Let's get this done this round.
Come on, let's split it fairly. You're losing value every round!
I'm not going to lose all the value. This is a fair split, let's make a deal.
You're losing a lot of value, I'm being generous here. Take it!
